p: So far, various pharmacological activities have been reported from Dorema spp., includinganti-microbial, anti-bacterial, anti-plasmodial, anti-fungal, cytotoxic, anti-inflammatory, free radical scavenging, hypolipidemic, anticonvulsant and anti-diabetic activities, as well as effects on pituitary gonad axis hormones. These reports have been mentioned in Tables 5 and 6.
